title: Gone but not forgotten [LoL Hall of Fame]
body:
Leave a comment with old items/stuff or even mechanics that don't exist anymore in 2018 lol
All for the nostalgia :p

I'll start with some ideas of my own:
- old ranged minion animations
- jungle buffs (season 5)
- scam sites selling overpriced skin codes
- skin codes
- championship riven crying
- philosopher stone
- mana potion
- cheap potions
- instant veigar cage
- double grap botlane
- tp + grap into fountain
- cheap rp
- unkillable maokai bug
- old map
- jax lvl 1 drake exploit
...
